OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD WORKING WOMENS OPPORTUNITY PROJECT LTD (SWWOP)

Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers street based evening outreach sessions, addressing the high levels of violence, substance misuse and unsafe sexual practice experienced by women working in street sex work, by harm reduction advice, GU appointments, practical help with condoms, clean works and personal alarms. Offers Exit Support for any woman wishing to leave street sex work and drugs through intensive support including access to drugs agencies. Training for statutory and voluntary sector agencies around issues street sex workers face and dispelling the myths around street sex work. Company limited by guarantee no 5413661. Self or any referral.
